## Vectors

In R, a vector is the simplest type of data structure. It is a sequence of data elements of the same basic type

```{r}
names <- c("Kevin", "Jenny", "Millie")

age <- c(20, 18, 33)

blue_eyes <- c(TRUE, FALSE, FALSE)
```




We will also discuss packages and how to install and load (or call) in the libraries for the packages you want to use.
